channel.title: New Project 2011 [Dedi Host] - Recruiting
channel.description:
EDIT: We got a team, but if you have outstanding coding skills or have experience with dedicated hosting and such we can still use you! Please PM me or reply, thank you!
Hello good people on Moparscape,
I've got a plan; a new server, with new, refreshing and unique features. Im talking about thinking outside the box, or the "normal" way of RS. Ofcourse, the basics will be the same but I've got some cool and refreshing idea's to make this server unique!
But; I'm not a pro-coder. I can code the basic stuff, but I've got bigger plans in mind. So this is what I can provide you; work with me and others on this new and exciting server. I will cover the costs needed for dedicated hosting, advertisment and so on. I've got alot of experience in marketing and managing, so I'll cover those things. The plan is to work together, to get better results then any other server and offer players a new experience!
Im trying to form a team, and I'll need coders for the server and webclient, I can do the GFX and website-work but some help on that would be nice too. I'm looking for pro's, who are willing to work together as a team. And just to make it clear; I dont want to be the "boss" or anything, I think everyone should have an equal important vote in how the server should be.
If you are interested and willing to do some serious work to make this server a succes, please reply or sent me a direct message. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me as well.
Thank you for reading!

item.description:
@317guy wrote:

[quote=“mrduck, post:1, topic:411182”]Hello good people on Moparscape,

I’ve got a plan; a new server, with new, refreshing and unique features. Im talking about thinking outside the box, or the “normal” way of RS. Ofcourse, the basics will be the same but I’ve got some cool and refreshing idea’s to make this server unique!

I will cover the costs needed for dedicated hosting, advertisment and so on. I’ve got alot of experience in marketing and managing, so I’ll cover those things. The plan is to work together, to get better results then any other server and offer players a new experience!

Im trying to form a team, and I’ll need coders for the server and webclient, I can do the GFX and website-work but some help on that would be nice too. I’m looking for pro’s, who are willing to work together as a team. And just to make it clear; I dont want to be the “boss” or anything, I think everyone should have an equal important vote in how the server should be.

If you are interested and willing to do some serious work to make this server a succes, please reply or sent me a direct message. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me as well.

Thank you for reading![/quote]
I logged into moparcraft and found that i got a message and i clicked on the link and found your post on moparcraft and it reminded me of my old codeing days and made me think about those days.
I would be happy to help
I can code severs/websites
my old rs codeing days were a year ago so i might be a bit rusty.
I can still code websites good.
PM me if i get the job if not
╭∩╮（︶︿︶）╭∩╮
